reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute and cozy, with good comfort. However, the sizing receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting it runs small and tight. Moreover, the quality, softness, and material thickness get mixed reviews - while some find it great and super soft with thick enough material, others report poor quality, not fluffy enough, and thin fabric. Additionally, the fur quality is criticized for looking cheap, and several customers mention the dress is very see-through. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute
items.body: It definitely does not have the same fluffy fur that is pictured, however it’s still super cute. I’m usually between a small and medium. I looked at the other reviews and sized up to a medium and I’m very glad I did. It’s very tight but just the way I like it, if I got a small there’s no way it would’ve been wearable. Overall it’s worth it! Read more
items.author: Evelyn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful piece of clothing
items.body: I bought this fun dress to wear to a show. I got SO many compliments when I wore it. People saying I look Angelic. I bought a Large and it was firm fitting on the arms. But overall, LOVE IT. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Short and shit tight
items.body: The dress is short which is expected from the picture but it is also a little bit too skin tight. The sleeves of the dress are were a little short and didn't go up to my wrist. Overall tho the dress was nice Read more
items.author: Eby

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy
items.body: Not at all what it looked like in photos. Material was very light, and sheer. Very short, looked like a shirt. Read more
items.author: Angela Rhea

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Came ripped different dress from what's pictured but close
items.body: I'm 5ft 4 inches tall 168 lbs got a large. Really tight but super cute and doesn't show a bunch of rolls due to the fabric it's made from. My arms aren't that big but feels quite tight in the arms. It came with a small hole up by the collar/ shoulder but I'll just sew it and hope it doesn't rip more. The drawstring does not have the fluffy poofs like the one the model is wearing so that is a bummer. It's more like what is pictured on the other people that reviewed it. The fur is also different not really furry but more fringy. The dress is soft and although very tight it seems comfortable. I have not worn it or washed it so still hard to tell how well it will hold up plus it being white I'll probably ruin it pretty fast. I'll definitely order another one Incase they sell out cause it's super cute. Also it is very short. I'll definitely need to wear it with leggings or really short white shorts underneath Read more
items.author: jessica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Winter wonderland
items.body: Amazing perfect fit and sexy outfit for your wintertime outings Read more
items.author: polly olsen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Christmas
items.body: Stunning dress i love it, fits perfectly n soft Read more
items.author: TP

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Shedding!
items.body: Fur is not durable enough to brush it to even make it fluffy, stuck to my hands like cat hair.. Longer than expected. So I'm returning this and finding something else for my birthday unfortunately. Read more
items.author: Mary Anne jabjanofsky

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A White Feathers, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
